title: TNF Preview: Giants-Eagles Gambling Picks, Props & DFS Advice (Football 10/22)
description:
Well, Week 7 of Thursday Night Football could feature a future division winner. So we have that going for us. But Giants-Eagles also offers a prime opportunity to make some money. Will Brinson is joined by R.J. White to break down this NFC East matchup from a gambling perspective. Carson Wentz has struggled overall against the spread, but he can't lose on TNF. His head coach Doug Pederson has a pretty good track record on Thursdays as well. Will that hold tonight? The Eagles are banged up but there might be some value in player props. For the Giants, R.J. is expecting a good performance from Evan Engram. Listen for full picks, props and DFS advice!
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @rjwhite1
Visit the Pick Six YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/picksix
